aic3204.docs:
The `aic3204` platform allows your ESPHome devices to use the AIC3204 ultra low power stereo audio codec (DAC). This allows the playback of audio via the microcontroller from a range of sources via [Media Player Components](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html).

*See also: [AIC3204](https://esphome.io/components/audio_dac/aic3204.html#aic3204)*

es8156.docs:
The `es8156` platform allows your ESPHome devices to use the ES8156 low power mono audio codec. This allows the playback of audio via the microcontroller from a range of sources via [Speaker Components](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/index.html) or [Media Player Components](https://esphome.io/components/media_player/index.html).

*See also: [ES8156](https://esphome.io/components/audio_dac/es8156.html#es8156)*
